column4: (She laughs at you.)  Scream all you want, nobody is coming to help you.
(A guard steps inside and looks at you.)  Prisoner DialogPlayerName.  I will take care of you today.
I'm guard DialogCharacterName.  I keep the Box safe and our prisoners secure.
Here you go.  (She removes your gag.)  Don't piss me off or that gag is coming back.
(This area of the club is under construction.  Lots of features still need to be coded, please wait for the next version for a more complete experience.)
